title: Leftover Tex-Mex Storage and Reheating

items.name: Tex-Mex leftovers fridge life
items.details: Leftover Tex-Mex dishes like stuffed poblano peppers are good for 3-4 days in the fridge. Check that they still smell and look OK before reheating -- no weird smell or discoloration.

items.name: Best reheating method: toaster oven
items.details: Toaster oven at 350F for 10-15 minutes gives the best texture -- keeps food crisp and evenly heated.

items.name: Quick reheating: microwave
items.details: Faster but can make food soggy. Use only if short on time.

notes: Restaurant to-go containers are fine for short-term fridge storage. When in doubt, always check smell and appearance before eating leftovers.
